com.paydiant.android.ui.service.deviceinfo

Interface IDeviceInfoService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DeviceInfoService

    public interface IDeviceInfoService
    The Interface defining the operations to manage the device specific information, such as device attributes, device specific ids/tokens etc.
    Since:
    4.5.0.1
    Author:
    Paydiant Inc.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addAdditionalDeviceInfo(AdditionalInformationList additionalInformationList)
      Adds the additional device info.
      void deleteAdditionalDeviceInfo(String... deleteKeys)
      Deletes the specified keys from the device info list.
      void removeListener()
      Removes the device info manager listener and sets it to null.
      void retrieveAdditionalDeviceInfo()
      Retrieve additional device info.
      void setDeviceInfoServiceListener(IDeviceInfoServiceListener deviceInfoServiceListener)
      Sets the listener to handle Device info manager service callbacks.
      void updateAdditionalDeviceInfo(AdditionalInformationList additionalInformationList)
      Update or Delete additional device info.

    • Method Detail

      • addAdditionalDeviceInfo

        void addAdditionalDeviceInfo(AdditionalInformationList additionalInformationList)
        Adds the additional device info.
        Parameters:
        additionalInformationList - the additional device info list Refer to DeviceInfoManagerService.addAdditionalDeviceInfo(AdditionalInformationList) for applicable error codes.
        See Also:
        IDeviceInfoManagerFacade.addAdditionalDeviceInfo(AdditionalInformationList), DeviceInfoManagerService.addAdditionalDeviceInfo(AdditionalInformationList)

      • updateAdditionalDeviceInfo

        void updateAdditionalDeviceInfo(AdditionalInformationList additionalInformationList)
        Update or Delete additional device info. In order to delete a specific key, set the value of the key to be null or empty.
        Parameters:
        additionalInformationList - the additional device info list Refer to DeviceInfoManagerService.updateAdditionalDeviceInfo(AdditionalInformationList) for applicable error codes.
        See Also:
        IDeviceInfoManagerFacade.updateAdditionalDeviceInfo(AdditionalInformationList), DeviceInfoManagerService.updateAdditionalDeviceInfo(AdditionalInformationList)

      • retrieveAdditionalDeviceInfo

        void retrieveAdditionalDeviceInfo()
        Retrieve additional device info. Refer to DeviceInfoManagerService.retrieveAdditionalDeviceInfo() for applicable error codes.
        See Also:
        IDeviceInfoManagerFacade.retrieveAdditionalDeviceInfo(), DeviceInfoManagerService.retrieveAdditionalDeviceInfo()

      • deleteAdditionalDeviceInfo

        void deleteAdditionalDeviceInfo(String... deleteKeys)
        Deletes the specified keys from the device info list.
        Parameters:
        deleteKeys - List of keys needed to be deleted from the additional device info. Refer to updateAdditionalDeviceInfo(AdditionalInformationList additionalDeviceInfoList) for applicable error codes.
        See Also:
        updateAdditionalDeviceInfo(AdditionalInformationList), updateAdditionalDeviceInfo(AdditionalInformationList)

      • setDeviceInfoServiceListener

        void setDeviceInfoServiceListener(IDeviceInfoServiceListener deviceInfoServiceListener)
        Sets the listener to handle Device info manager service callbacks.
        Parameters:
        deviceInfoServiceListener - the new device info listener. This can be either an implementation of IDeviceInfoServiceListener or an extended instance of DeviceInfoServiceListenerAdapter.
        See Also:
        IDeviceInfoServiceListener, DeviceInfoServiceListenerAdapter

      • removeListener

        void removeListener()
        Removes the device info manager listener and sets it to null.
